statements: UPDATE leadership_communication_records SET effectiveness_rating = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE leadership_communication_records SET sender = 'John Doe', receiver = 'Jane Smith' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE leadership_communication_records SET sender='John Doe', message='Thank you for your hard work', date_sent='2022-09-15', effectiveness_rating=4 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE leadership_communication_records SET effectiveness_rating=5, date_sent='2022-10-01', message='Requesting feedback on the recent project', receiver='Jane Smith' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE leadership_messages SET message_text = 'New message text' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE message_feedback SET rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Great message!' WHERE feedback_id = 3;
UPDATE leadership_messages SET message_text='New message text', timestamp=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE message_id=1 AND sender_id=101 AND receiver_id=201;
UPDATE message_feedback SET rating=5, feedback_text='Great message!', feedback_date='2022-08-15' WHERE feedback_id=1 AND message_id=1;
UPDATE leadership_messages SET sent_date = '2021-10-25 15:30:00' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE message_metrics SET open_rate = 0.75, click_through_rate = 0.40 WHERE message_id = 2;
UPDATE leadership_messages SET message_text = 'New leadership message content' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE message_metrics SET open_rate = 0.7, click_through_rate = 0.15 WHERE message_id = 2;
UPDATE leadership_communication SET sender_id = 1001, received_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE message_feedback SET rating = 4, feedback = 'Great communication!' WHERE sender_id = 1002 AND message_id = 5;
UPDATE leadership_communication SET received_timestamp = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE message_feedback SET rating = 5, feedback = 'Great communication' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE communication_records SET message = 'New message content' WHERE communication_id = 1;
UPDATE sender SET department = 'Sales' WHERE sender_id = 2;
UPDATE communication_records SET sender_id = 101, receiver_id = 201, message = 'Updated message content' WHERE communication_id = 12345;
UPDATE sender SET department = 'Marketing', sender_name = 'John Doe' WHERE sender_id = 301;
